The game that never dies. CSGO is a great mix of fast paced gun-play and a decent amount of real time strategy. The only downside of this game is the immense number of cheaters that one encounters while playing the game. With the release of valorant, I believe that the only thing that could actually kill counter strike is the lack of a decent anti-cheat system. Valve, pls fix.
